docs.lead_paragraph: The bacterium responsible for the Black Death probably caused small outbreaks of lung disease for thousands of years before it evolved.

headline.main: Study Shows Diseases Like Plague Can Perilously Evolve
headline.print_headline: Study Shows Diseases Can Perilously Evolve

docs.abstract: Dr Wyndham W Lathem study in journal Nature Communications on Yersinia pestis, bacterium responsible for Black Death epidemic, required only one added gene to become deadly and one mutation to that gene to evolve two means of transmission.
docs.snippet: The bacterium responsible for the Black Death probably caused small outbreaks of lung disease for thousands of years before it evolved.

docs.lead_paragraph: The idea seems to reward people for adopting poor health habits in the first place, but society stands to benefit.

headline.main: Paying People to Be Healthy Usually Works, if the Public Can Stomach It

docs.snippet: The idea seems to reward people for adopting poor health habits in the first place, but society stands to benefit.

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman killed by measles in Washington state had been vaccinated against the disease as a child but succumbed because she had a compromised immune system, a local health official told a TV station.

headline.main: Washington Woman's Measles Death Is First in US Since 2003
headline.print_headline: Washington Woman's Measles Death Is First in US Since 2003

docs.snippet: A woman killed by measles in Washington state had been vaccinated against the disease as a child but succumbed because she had a compromised immune system, a local health official told a TV station.

docs.lead_paragraph: Measles killed a Washington woman in the spring — the first such death in the U.S. in 12 years and the first in the state in 25, health officials said Thursday.

headline.main: Washington Woman's Measles Death Is First in US Since 2003
